item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储大幅减息后的市场亢奋情绪正在消退，日本央行避免了冲击，梅赛德斯-奔驰因中国困境而暴跌。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The market euphoria that followed the Fed’s big cut is fading, the Bank of Japan avoids a shock and Mercedes-Benz tumbles amid China woes. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 英镑触及两年高点后开始变得脆弱
item.description: 本周，英镑的反弹势头再次受到刺激，但摩根大通私人银行（J.P. Morgan Private Bank）、道富环球市场（State Street Global Markets）和杰富瑞（Jefferies）的策略师们表示，英镑的涨势正变得越来越脆弱。【原文：The pound’s peer-beating rally got a fresh spur this week, but strategists from J.P. Morgan Private Bank, State Street Global Markets and Jefferies say those gains are looking increasingly fragile.】

item.title: 据说万达购物中心运营商即将完成股东改制
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大连万达集团股份有限公司（Dalian Wanda Group Co.【原文：Dalian Wanda Group Co. is close to bringing in new shareholders for its mall operating unit, according to people familiar with the subject.】

item.title: Raiffeisen 在出售白俄罗斯业务的交易中损失 8 亿欧元
item.description: 莱法森国际银行股份公司（Raiffeisen Bank International AG）同意出售其白俄罗斯分行，交易完成后将使其利润减少约 8 亿欧元（约合 8.93 亿美元）。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG agreed to sell its Belarusian unit in a deal that will dent its profit by about €800 million ($893 million) at closing.】

item.title: 德国商业银行劳工代表认为三分之二的工作岗位面临风险
item.description: 德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）的劳工代表 "坚决 "阻止与意大利竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的合并，并警告说该德国贷款机构三分之二的工作岗位可能会在收购中被裁减。【原文：Commerzbank AG’s labor representatives are “bitterly determined” to prevent a merger with Italian rival UniCredit SpA, warning that two-thirds of the jobs at the German lender could be cut in a takeover.】

item.title: 汉莎航空考虑在竞争中削减每日北京航班量
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）正在考虑是否削减每天从法兰克福飞往北京的航班，理由是无法与可以自由穿越俄罗斯领空的海湾航空公司竞争。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG is reviewing whether to cut its daily flight from Frankfurt to Beijing, citing its inability to compete with Gulf airlines that are free to travel through Russian air space.】

item.title: 赛诺菲的多发性硬化症药物可减缓病情发展
item.description: 赛诺菲公司治疗一种多发性硬化症的实验性药物将残疾进展的时间推迟了近三分之一，为目前尚无治疗方法的患者带来了希望。【原文：Sanofi’s experimental drug for a form of multiple sclerosis delayed the progression of disability by nearly a third, providing hope for patients for whom there’s currently no treatment.】

item.title: Xbox 总裁谈掌上游戏机和订阅游戏
item.description:
莎拉-邦德（Sarah Bond）相对来说是个局外人，她正在领导一家落后于索尼和任天堂的公司进行高风险的转型。【原文：

A relative outsider, Sarah Bond is leading a high-stakes transformation of a company that’s lagging behind Sony and Nintendo.

】

item.title: 美银策略师哈特内特：泡沫风险回归，买入债券和黄金
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，美联储降息后股票市场的亢奋情绪正在煽起泡沫风险，使债券和黄金成为抵御任何经济衰退或通胀重现的诱人对冲工具。【原文：The euphoria in equity markets following the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cut is stoking the risk of a bubble, making bonds and gold an attractive hedge against any recession or renewed inflation, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 以色列将战争焦点转向因寻呼机爆炸而被削弱的真主党
item.description: 以色列通过诱杀寻呼机和对讲机打击黎巴嫩和叙利亚境内真主党成员的行动已酝酿多年，而现在使用这些设备则加剧了旨在彻底瓦解该组织的高风险行动。【原文：Israel’s operation against Hezbollah members in Lebanon and Syria through booby-trapped pagers and walkie-talkies was years in the making, and its use now ramped up a high-risk campaign aimed at deeply disrupting the group.】

item.title: 俄罗斯利用黑名单油轮运输石油的速度正在加快
item.description: 越来越多因参与运输俄罗斯石油而受到制裁的油轮重新找到了工作；这对西方当局来说是一个打击，因为他们曾试图取缔这些船只，以打击莫斯科获得石油美元的机会。【原文：A growing number oil tankers that were sanctioned for their role in transporting Russian petroleum are finding work again — a blow to western authorities who sought to clamp down on the vessels in an effort to hurt Moscow’s access to petrodollars.】

item.title: 中国打击诺和诺德减肥药的非法仿制
item.description: 中国已开始打击无证生产和销售与诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk A/S）的糖尿病和肥胖症治疗药物类似的药品，以遏制在全球供应紧张的情况下迎合此类疗法日益增长的需求的灰色市场。【原文：China has started cracking down on unlicensed production and sale of medicines similar to Novo Nordisk A/S’s blockbuster diabetes and obesity treatment, in a bid to curb a gray market that caters to growing demand for such therapies amid a global supply crunch.】

item.title: 加密货币广告充斥印度最高法院的 YouTube 页面，恐遭黑客攻击
item.description: 印度最高法院用于流媒体诉讼程序的官方 YouTube 频道据称在周五被黑客入侵，显示了加密货币广告。【原文：The official YouTube channel of the Supreme Court of India that was used for streaming proceedings was purportedly compromised by hackers on Friday showing crypto advertisements.】

item.title: 英国央行行长曼称货币政策委员会应缓慢行动然后积极减息
item.description: 英国央行决策者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，她倾向于在更长时间内保持较高利率，然后在通胀风险明显减退时再更积极地降息。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Catherine Mann said she would prefer to keep rates higher for longer and then cut more aggressively when it is clear inflation risks are receding.】

item.title: 陷入困境的中国省财政厅长在高楼坠落中丧生
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，中国中部湖南省财政厅厅长周四从一栋高楼坠落身亡，目前正在进行刑事调查。【原文：The finance chief of China’s central Hunan province fell to her death from a high-rise building Thursday, local media have reported, in what’s being investigated as a criminal matter.】

item.title: 印度向马尔代夫提供足够资金用于支付苏库克债券票息
item.description: 印度借给马尔代夫足够的资金来支付即将到来的伊斯兰债券，缓解了这个岛国近期的违约风险。【原文：India lent the Maldives enough funds for its upcoming Islamic bond payments, easing a default risk for the island nation in the near-term.】

item.title: 亚洲历史最悠久的证券交易所将迎来有史以来最好的一周，竞争对手有望首次公开募股
item.description: 印度 BSE 证券交易所有限公司的股票有望创下有史以来最好的单周表现，因为投资者押注于该证券交易所运营商因竞争对手可能首次公开募股上市而带来的交易繁荣。【原文：BSE Ltd.’s stock in India is poised for its best weekly performance ever as investors bet on a trading boom for the stock exchange operator stemming from a competitor’s potential IPO listing.】

item.description:

item.title: 外国投资者因日元恐慌抛售创纪录的日本股票
item.description: 上周，外国投资者抛售日本股票的数量创下历史之最，因为他们对主要央行的决策感到不安。【原文：Foreign investors sold the most Japanese equities on record last week amid jitters going into major central bank decisions.】

item.title: 冬季供应乐观，欧洲天然气周跌幅扩大
item.description: 由于对欧洲地区冬季天然气供应充足的信心不断增强，欧洲天然气价格将连续第三周下跌。【原文：European natural gas prices are set for a third weekly decline on mounting confidence that the region will have sufficient winter supplies.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）称，只有极少数碳项目是高质量的
item.description: 根据摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：Just 5% of more than 4,000 projects in the global carbon-credit market are considered high quality, according to an analysis by MSCI Inc.】

item.title: 东京地铁首次公开募股计划筹资 20 多亿美元
item.description: 东京地铁公司是日本首都两家地铁运营商之一，其首次公开募股将筹集约 3196 亿日元（22.5 亿美元）的资金，这将极大地推动日本新股市场的发展。【原文：The initial public offering of Tokyo Metro Co., one of two subway operators based in Japan’s capital, is seeking to raise around 319.6 billion yen ($2.25 billion), giving a big boost to the country’s market for new listings.】

item.title: 非洲顶级基金管理公司 PIC 为鸡肉生产商提供贷款支持
item.description: 南非最大的基金管理公司南非公共投资公司（Public Investment Corp.【原文：South Africa’s Public Investment Corp., the continent’s biggest fund manager, has backed Daybreak Foods Ltd. with a 250 million-rand ($14 million) loan to boost its operations and balance sheet.】

item.title: 俄罗斯燃料出口反弹，柴油和燃料油流量上升
item.description: 由于炼油率提高，柴油和燃料油运输量回升，俄罗斯石油产品出口在本月上半月出现反弹。【原文：Russian oil-product exports rebounded in the first half of this month, driven by a recovery in diesel and fuel oil shipments amid improved refining rates.】

item.title: SEB 调查显示瑞典央行降息半点的可能性很小
item.description: SEB AB 的一项调查显示，瑞典固定收益投资者预计瑞典央行下周将把基准利率下调四分之一个点，少数投资者预计下调幅度会更大。【原文：Swedish fixed-income investors expect the Riksbank to cut its benchmark rate by a quarter-point next week, with a minority projecting a larger cut, a survey from SEB AB showed.】

item.title: 刚果计划为 20 世纪 70 年代的麻风腮注射开展皮肤瘢痕培训
item.description: 非洲医护人员正在抗击一种毒性水痘菌株的迅速传播，他们将学习如何有效地搔抓儿童皮肤下层以诱导免疫反应，这种方法几十年来一直未在接种推广中广泛使用。【原文：African health-care workers fighting the rapid spread of a virulent mpox strain will learn how to effectively scratch under layers of children’s skin to induce an immune response, a method not widely used in inoculation rollouts for decades.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称跨境银行整合很重要
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧洲银行业的整合 "非常重要"，这与本周早些时候发表的言论不谋而合。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said European banking consolidation is “important,” echoing comments made earlier this week.】

item.title: 交易员认为津巴布韦股市大涨 28% 和 ZiG 走弱将带来麻烦
item.description: 由于投资者寻求避险，以金银为支撑的新货币兑美元汇率创下了历史新低，津巴布韦股市大涨。【原文：Zimbabwe’s stocks are on a tear as investors seek refuge from the new bullion-backed currency that’s at a record low against the US dollar.】

item.title: 美联储和中国需求提振基本金属，本周表现强劲
item.description: 在美联储降息半个百分点的帮助下，铜价飙升至两个月来的新高，为本周金属市场的强劲表现画上了句号。【原文：Copper surged to a two-month high to cap a strong week for metals, helped by the Federal Reserve’s half-point rate cut.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行将在 12 月了解更多情况，但所有选项都是开放的
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧洲中央银行将在今年的最后一次会议上更好地了解经济和通胀状况，但仍有可能在下个月采取利率行动。【原文：The European Central Bank will be better informed on the state of the economy and inflation at its final meeting of the year, but could still move on interest rates next month, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】
